# SortOrder.reverse

**Case**

The ordering that places the first item after the second when comparing two items using an ascending order.

## Declaration

```swift
case reverse
```

## Discussion

The ordering places the first item after the second when a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ComparisonResult] of two items is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ComparisonResult/orderedAscending].

## Using Sort Orders

- **SortOrder.forward**: The ordering that places the first item before the second when comparing two items using an ascending order.
